summary: [FALLBACK TEMPLATE] A 4-week study plan for Creative Writing
learning_objectives: Understand core concepts of Creative Writing
Develop practical skills in Creative Writing
Apply knowledge of Creative Writing to real-world scenarios

milestones.title: Week 1: Fundamentals
milestones.description: Introduction to basic concepts of Creative Writing

milestones.title: Week 4: Advanced Applications
milestones.description: Master advanced aspects of Creative Writing

recommendations: Focus on hands-on practice while studying Creative Writing. Consider joining relevant communities for support.
